description._content:
I was born and raised in New Haven, Connecticut, USA. 

I am on a path of self discovery and freedom.  Photography feeds my soul and it is a great platform for personal expression.  I challenge myself to capture a certain "feel" in every photo I take.
 
I appreciate all the nice comments from my flickr contacts and friends and I love to view all different styles of photography.  Please do not use my photos without my permission. 

Peace to you !
